name: Regular Savings
details: Unparalleled access to your money Begin your savings journey with an HNB Savings Account and manage your day-to-day transactions with ease and convenience while earning interest on your daily balance. Benefits Low minimum opening deposit of Rs.2,000 Visa International Debit Card Immediate loan facilities of up to 90% of the balance Pathum Vimana rewards Access to over 450 HNB Smart ATMs and 249 customer centres Internet and Mobile Banking access Track your account transactions using monthly e-statements or passbook
